page.title: 17Improving Cuckney Churchyard
page.content: The young people of the Community Task Force are working in Cuckney church, the chuchyard and the church hall.Some are repairing and building up the stone wall of the church. In the yard they are moving the headstones and leaning them up against the church wall.They are also mowing the grass over the graves and have planted bulbs on each side of the path to the church door.They are also digging to reveal the ditch of the old Motte and Bailey castle which used to stand on the site and they are shoring up the sides with stone . The Church Hall is being repaired and borders are being dug on either side of it . The whole area looks much smarter than it did in 1984 when the Task Force began and the work should be finished by August 23rd 1985.
